title: Table Talk: Dinner Party
description: No awkward silences. Interesting hypotheticals and stories to keep the conversation flowing.

cards.content: If you could instantly download one skill into your brain (Matrix style), what would it be?
What is a book or movie that fundamentally changed how you see the world?
If you could invite any 3 people (dead or alive) to this dinner, who would they be?
What is the weirdest food you have ever tried?
Do you believe in aliens? Why or why not?
What is the most expensive thing you’ve broken?
If money was no object, what would your dream job be?
What is a fashion trend you hope never comes back?
If you had to live in a different era of history, which one would you choose?
What is your biggest pet peeve in a friendship?
If you could only listen to one album for the rest of your life, what would it be?
What is a small act of kindness you were shown that you will never forget?
Would you rather explore the deep ocean or outer space?
What is the best piece of advice you’ve ever received?
If you could rename yourself, what name would you pick?
What is your favorite holiday and why?
If you could teleport anywhere right now, where would you go?
What is the most beautiful place you have ever visited?
Do you think social media has done more good or harm?
If you opened a restaurant, what kind of food would you serve?
What is a childhood toy you miss?
If you could be an Olympic athlete in any sport, which would it be?
What is the scariest movie you have ever seen?
If animals could talk, which one would be the rudest?
What is your favorite smell?
If you could live in any fictional universe (Harry Potter, Star Wars, etc.), which one?
What is the best gift you have ever given someone?
Do you believe in ghosts?
What is a talent you wish you had?
If you were a superhero, what would your power be?
What is the worst job you have ever had?
If you could eliminate one thing from the world, what would it be?
What is your go-to karaoke song?
If you could speak to your younger self, what would you say?
What is the most daring thing you have ever done?
Do you prefer the city or the countryside?
What is a habit you are trying to break?
If you had a warning label, what would it say?
What is the best compliment you have ever received?
If you could swap lives with a celebrity for a day, who would it be?
What is your biggest fear?
If you found $100 on the ground, what would you do with it?
What is a subject you wish you learned in school?
Do you believe in soulmates?
What is the funniest joke you know?
If you were a color, which one would you be?
What is your favorite season?
If you could have an unlimited supply of one thing, what would it be?
What is something you are looking forward to this week?
If you wrote a book, what would it be about?
What is the most useful app on your phone?
If you could understand any language instantly, which one?
What is your favorite way to relax?
If you could be famous for anything, what would it be?
What is a conspiracy theory you think might be true?
If you could change one law, what would it be?
What is the most interesting documentary you've watched?
If you were a ghost, who would you haunt?
What is your favorite dessert?
If you could have any animal as a pet (tame), what would it be?
What is the first thing you would do during a zombie apocalypse?
If you could see 10 years into the future, would you look?
What is something you are proud of?
